Title: Baishe Srabon
Writer: Annapurna Basu (subtitles), Goutam Ghose (poetry), Srijit Mukherji (dialogue), Srijit Mukherji (screenplay), Srijit Mukherji (story)
Actors: Prasenjit Chatterjee, Parambrata Chatterjee, Raima Sen, Abir Chatterjee
Plot: An ex-cop is hired to track down a serial killer who carries out his killings according to Bengali poetry.
